Package org.jclouds.scriptbuilder.statements.login

Interface Summary
AdminAccess.Configuration  
 

Class Summary
AdminAccess Controls the administrative access to a node.
AdminAccess.Builder  
AdminAccess.Config  
DefaultConfiguration  
ReplaceShadowPasswordEntry Replaces the password entry for a user in the shadow file, using SHA-512 crypt syntax.
ReplaceShadowPasswordEntryOfLoginUser  
ShadowStatements Statements used to manipulate the shadow file
Sudoers Control /etc/sudoers
SudoStatements Statements used in sudo control
UserAdd Creates a statement that will add a given user to a machine ("login"), with optional password, groups, private key, and authorized keys.
UserAdd.Builder
